cards.title: Pecos Bill
powers: you may activate a [u]tall tale[/u] text. {PecosBill} deals 1 target 1 projectile damage. a folk target deals 1 target 1 melee damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power.
Select a Hero. The next time that Hero uses a Power, that Hero also deals 1 Target 1 Melee Damage.

openingLines.default: hoo-wee! We got ourselves some 'rasslin' to do, folks.
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: ah don't have to understand a thing to hit it real hard.

cards.title: Big Colt .45
body: When this card is destroyed, {PecosBill} deals 1 target 2 projectile damage.
cards.flavorText: “Single action army, new in 1873,{BR}serviced by only one man for over{BR}a century. remarkable specimen!”

cards.title: Big Man on the Scene
body: When this card enters play, each hero target regains 1 hp.
powers: {PecosBill} deals 1 target 2 melee damage. If a target is destroyed this way, {PecosBill} deals 1 target 2 irreducible psychic damage, then if no damage is dealt this way, play a card.
cards.flavorText: “dun' worry, y'all!{BR}ya got [b]pecos bill[/b]{BR}on yer side!”

cards.title: Coyote Raised
body: when this card enters play, you may draw a card.
increase damage dealt by {PecosBill} by 1.
powers: {PecosBill} deals up to 3 targets 1 melee damage each.
cards.flavorReference: no tail, the saga of pecos bill

cards.title: Dun' Get Twisted
body: Play this card next to [i]Tamed Twister[/i]. If [i]Tamed Twister[/i] is ever not in play, destroy this card.
when [i]Tamed Twister[/i] destroys a villain target, move it to the bottom of the villain deck instead of the trash.
cards.flavorText: “Bill, git down here{BR}'fore ya shuffle all o' Kansas!”

cards.title: Go Down Fightin'
body: You may activate a [u]tall tale[/u] text.
If you have at least 1 folk card in play, a player may draw a card. If you have at least 2 folk cards in play, a player may play a card. If you have 3 folk cards in play, a hero may use a power.
You may draw or play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: 'sir' is my pa.{BR}and we ain't done yet!

cards.title: Just You 'n' Me, Pardner
body: You may activate a [u]tall tale[/u] text.
Destroy all your hyperbole cards, then all your folk cards. {PecosBill} regains X HP, then deals 1 target X melee damage, where X = the number of cards destroyed this way times 2.
cards.flavorText: “lookee that,{BR}e'ryone's in th'other room.{BR}just us then!”

cards.title: Loyal Lightning
body: at the end of your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, [i]Loyal Lightning[/i] deals 1 target 2 lightning damage.
When this card would be destroyed, destroy all hyperbole cards next to it instead and restore it to 5 HP. Otherwise, {PecosBill} deals himself 2 psychic damage, then destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “your hoss has a bellyful of bedsprings.”
cards.flavorReference: Slim, the saga of pecos bill

cards.title: Not 'Round Me You Don't
body: When a non-hero target enters play, {PecosBill} may deal that target 1 melee damage.
powers: Until the start of your next turn, when a hero target would be dealt damage you may redirect it to a target in this play area.
cards.flavorText: “yer just a down-low dirty{BR}devil-smoke, ain't ya?”

cards.title: Ready to 'Rassel
body: You may activate a [u]tall tale[/u] text.

Select a target. {PecosBill} deals that target 2 melee damage. [i]Loyal Lightning[/i] deals that target 2 lightning damage. [i]Shake the Snake[/i] deals that target 2 toxic damage. [i]Tamed Twister[/i] deals that target 2 projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: I am [b]not[/b]{BR}waiting around to find out!

cards.title: Rustlin'
body: Play this card next to [i]Loyal Lightning[/i]. If [i]Loyal Lightning[/i] is ever not in play, destroy this card.
Reduce damage dealt to folk cards by 1.

activatableAbilities.name: tall tale
activatableAbilities.text: Reveal the top card of a deck other than yours. Put it into play or discard it.

cards.flavorText: “ain't no mountain lion,{BR}but he got a big stride{BR}and no end o' energy.”

cards.title: Shake 'em Up
body: Play this card next to [i]Shake the Snake[/i]. If [i]Shake the Snake[/i] is ever not in play, destroy this card.
When exactly 1 damage would be dealt by a villain target, redirect that damage to that target.

activatableAbilities.name: tall tale
activatableAbilities.text: Until the end of the turn, increase damage dealt by 1.

cards.flavorText: “robits ya called 'em?{BR}not so smart, are they.”

cards.title: Shake the Snake
body: at the end of your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, draw 2 cards.
When this card would be destroyed, destroy all hyperbole cards next to it instead and restore it to 5 HP. Otherwise, {PecosBill} deals himself 2 psychic damage, then destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “the [i]nueva mexico cascabela grande[/i]{BR}of Raton Pass. or, ya know,{BR}[b]Shake[/b]. fer short.”

cards.title: Tall Tale Justice
body: If there are no folk cards in play, you may move one from your hand or trash into play.

If no hyperbole cards in your hand refer to a target in play, search your trash and deck for a hyperbole card and put it in your hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle your deck. You may play a hyperbole card.
You may activate a [u]tall tale[/u] text.
cards.flavorText: “ah. he wasn't just spinning yarns.{BR}well, why am I surprised?”

cards.title: Tamed Twister
body: at the end of your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, play a card.
When this card would be destroyed, destroy all hyperbole cards next to it instead and restore it to 5 HP. Otherwise, {PecosBill} deals himself 2 psychic damage, then destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “awright big guy,{BR}y'ain't th'only one what got{BR}weather under yer thumb.”

cards.title: Twist(er) of Fate
body: Play this card next to [i]Tamed Twister[/i]. If [i]Tamed Twister[/i] is ever not in play, destroy this card.
When a target in this play area other than [i]Tamed Twister[/i] deals damage to a target, [i]Tamed Twister[/i] deals that target 1 projectile damage.

activatableAbilities.name: tall tale
activatableAbilities.text: [i]Tamed Twister[/i] deals each non-hero target 1 projectile damage.

cards.flavorText: “oh good, looks like Bill's{BR}got crowd control covered.”

cards.title: Unraveled Shake
body: Play this card next to [i]Shake the Snake[/i]. If [i]Shake the Snake[/i] is ever not in play, destroy this card.
When damage dealt by a target in this play area destroys a target, draw a card.

cards.title: Widow-Maker
body: Play this card next to [i]Loyal Lightning[/i]. If [i]Loyal Lightning[/i] is ever not in play, destroy this card.
When damage would be dealt by {PecosBill} but is prevented or reduced so {PecosBill} deals no damage, [i]Loyal Lightning[/i] deals that target 1 irreducible lightning damage.

activatableAbilities.name: tall tale
activatableAbilities.text: [i]Loyal Lightning[/i] deals 1 target 1 irreducible lightning damage.

cards.flavorText: “boy, yer gonna need a new name{BR}if'n you keep this up!”
